subject: Figure Skating
Olympic Games (2010)
lead_paragraph: Miki Ando performs in the shadows of South Korea’s Kim Yu-na and Japan’s Mao Asada, but Ando and her coach believe her move to the U.S. has given her a shot at a medal in 2010.
snippet: Miki Ando performs in the shadows of South Korea’s Kim Yu-na and Japan’s Mao Asada, but Ando and her coach believe her move to the U.S. has given her a shot at a medal in 2010.
